price: 92. Haddiise uu ka mid yahay (Xaq) beeniyayaasha, habowsanaaysaha ah.
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
